response.overview: 'Darling' is a hilarious ride of confusion and Comedy of Errors. Babli who is in search of true love, meets three guys who equally love her and believes that Babli too loves them with equal intensity. The pursuance of each individual love story creates havoc and hilarious situations to follow. The only question is which love story will see the happy ending.
response.tagline: 'Darling' is a hilarious ride of confusion and Comedy of Errors. Babli who is in search of true love, meets three guys who equally love her and believes that Babli too loves them with equal intensity.
response.title: Darling

results.name: DARLING - OFFICIAL TRAILER 4K | डार्लिंग | Prathamesh P | Ritika S | Nikkhhil C | 10th Dec 2021
